lead_paragraph: The political blog Daily Kos said it could not trust data from Research 2000, a polling company that has done research for several news organizations.
snippet: The political blog Daily Kos said it could not trust data from Research 2000, a polling company that has done research for several news organizations.

headline.main: Politics Blog Questions Polling Data It Has Used
headline.print_headline: Politics Blog Questions Polling Data It Has Used
